lines.speaker: T.O.M.
lines.text: (HINT) Make sure you've collected at least 2 orbs.

lines.speaker: T.O.M.
lines.text: (HINT) That is if you want to get out of here.

lines.speaker: T.O.M.
lines.text: (HINT) Watchout for sudden environmental changes like earthquakes

lines.speaker: T.O.M.
lines.text: (HINT) Make sure to defeat all monsters
